Directions: In a bowl, combine the first four ingredients; mix well. Remove 3/4 cup to a small bowl for serving; cover and refrigerate. Grill chicken, uncovered, over medium heat for 3 minutes on each side. Grill 6-8 minutes longer or until juices run clear, basting with remaining sauce and turning occasionally. Serve with reserved sauce.
Ingredients: 8 (4 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
